story:
About The Golden Lifetree

a worldwide project for more light and love

The Lifetree is a map that helps people to get through the maze of life, right to their deepest core and their own highest truth. Throughout the project "Golden Lifetree" Smoenjala paints this very map around the world – branch by branch, root by root.

This way over 500 paintings are composed together like dominoes to a giant Tree of Life, and thus universal love takes on the form of the “Golden Lifetree”. In addition, everywhere, where the caravan of the Golden Lifetree is welcome, Smoenjala paints a personal Tree of Life for the country. This way, expressed by the pictures, a light-grid of universal love embraces the globe.

By purchasing these paintings, as well as by any other type of alternative support, you become a conscious co-creator of this light network, contribute to the growth of the tree of life as well as future projects. One of the fruits of the Golden Lifetree is to be a living “Healing Art Park”, with seminars, concerts, exhibitions, meditations, a holistic place of transformation, a "Garden of Eden" from the future in the NOW.

In this garden, an integrated platform is created for children, on which they are supported in different ways to save and evolve their own divine creativity.
Another fruit in the "Garden of Eden" is the Golden Pomegranate, a new kind of education space of new age consciousness and creativity through the art of empathy.


… and so the Golden Lifetree always brings new flowers to bloom and new fruits to ripen …

 

Behind the scenes

the Initiator Smoenjala and the Golden Lifetree team

To make the Golden Lifetree blossom and ripe, for the last year, we, a small team of three people, have been dedicating all our love and energy, in volunteer work, have self-financed the project and brought it, to where it is now.

The first fruit that has come to ripen is our internet presence.

¡¡¡ www.GoldenLifetree.org came to see the light of day on April 25 2013!!!

The second fruit is what you are seeing here – the Golden Lifetree fundraising campaign. Presenting a worldwide project for more light and love requires a lot of light and love, thought and dedication, creativity and implementing capacity.  All this has been flowing into our campaign.   

The next flower that is already blossoming and eagerly waiting to be manifested and turn into a fruit is the first Golden Lifetree exhibition from July 4th - 26th 2013 in San Sebastian de La Gomera (Canary Islands) which initiates the project of the Golden Lifetree.


So this is where we are at the moment. The Golden Lifetree Team has been working voluntarily and so did some of our helpers, from the bottom of their hearts, without anything in exchange. Some artists forgo the payment of their fees but need bed and breakfast. And some work will simply have to be paid. Until now, as we´ve already mentioned above, we´ve self-financed the project in endless hours of volunteer work but now we are about to take the next step, where the Golden Lifetree is to grow into and rise to its true greatness and full potential.


How you can support the project

and help spreading the seeds

You, of course, will want to know, where your money goes to, what it is used for so we have been creative to make it as easy as possible for anyone who wishes to support the growth of the Golden Lifetree and collected a list of ways to do so...
 

 you can support the project through purchasing one or more of our exclusive perks here on indiegogo

 you can browse through the galleries on www.goldenlifetree.org, purchase paintings and other kinds of art, like music and there’s much more to come, so stay tuned!

 you can help us in many different ways. on http://www.goldenlifetree.org/en/verwirklichung/ we created a list of areas in which we will need support on our journey to embrace the light-grid of universal love throughout the globe. Go check it out!   


And you can always help to spread the seeds of the Golden Lifetree project throughout the world by sending a friendly link to this indigogo project to your friends and family or even organisations within your reach who you`d think might be interested in collaborating with us!

 

 

 

 

Just as unique as our project

and in three languages to make it as global as possible :-)

 

5€ … SEED / SAMEN / SEMILLA ...

Smoenjala says a heartwarming THANK YOU with a nicely designed digital postcard

***

Smoenjala sagt ein herzliches DANKESCHÖN mit einer schön gestalteten digitalen Postkarte

***

Smoenjala da las GRACIAS con una postal digital, designada con mucho cariño

 

10€ … SEEDLING / SETZLING / PANTÓN ...

A “Golden Lifetree” wallpaper for your screen will fill you with light and love while you are browsing and spreading the word

***

Ein “Goldener Lebensbaum” Desktophintergrund für deinen Bildschirm wird dich mit Licht und Liebe füllen während du surfst und die Nachricht verbreitest

***

Un „Árbol Dorado de la Vida“ fondo de escritorio para la pantalla te va a llenar con luz y amor mientras navegas y corres la voz

 

20€ … TWIG / ZWEIG / RAMITA ...

Day and night - two different expressions of the “Golden Lifetree” mother painting – open up new dimensions on your screen and in your soul

***

Tag & Nacht – zwei unterschiedliche Ausdrücke des Goldenen Lebensbaum Mutterbildes eröffnen neue Dimensionen auf deinem Bildschirm und in deiner Seele

***

Día & noche - dos expresiones diferentes del cuadro madre del “Árbol Dorado de la Vida" - abren nuevas dimensiones en la pantalla y en tu alma

 

30€ … BRANCH / AST / RAMA ...

Dive into a deeper understanding of your own divinity … 3 pictures will take you on a journey into the universe just by sitting in front of your pc

***

Tauche ein in ein tieferes Verständnis deiner eigenen Göttlichkeit ... 3 Bilder werden dich auf eine Reise ins Universum mitnehmen und das, während du einfach nur vor deinem PC sitzt

***

Sumérgete en una comprensión más profunda de tu propia divinidad ... 3 fotos te llevarán en un viaje por el universo con sólo sentarte frente a tu PC

 

50€ … ROOTS / WURZELN / RAÍCES ...

Visit the birthplace of the “Golden Lifetree” through the eyes of Smoenjala. 10 digital photos invite you to let your soul wonder through the wonders of La Gomera.

***

Besuche den Geburtsort des “Goldenen Lebensbaumes” durch die Augen von Smoenjala. 10 Fotos laden dich ein, deine Seele wandern zu lassen durch die Wunder La Gomeras

***

Visite el lugar de nacimiento del "Árbol Dorado de la Vida" a través de los ojos de Smoenjala. 10 fotografías que te invitan a dejar vagar tu alma por las maravillas de La Gomera

 

70€ … LEAF / BLATT / HOJA :::

… from heart to heart… 4 printable postcards from Smoenjala´s “heart collection” to send two your loved ones. The photos will inspire you to open up your own heart and see that love is all around you, in every aspect of your life

***

… von Herz zu Herz … 4 ausdruckbare Postkarten von Smoenjalas “Herz Sammlung”, um sie an deine Lieben zu versenden. Die Fotos werden dich inspirieren dein eigenes Herz zu öffnen und zu sehen, dass Liebe überall um dich herum ist, in jedem Aspekt deines Lebens

***

... De corazón a corazón ... 4 postales para imprimir de la "colección de corazónes" de Smoenjala para enviar a tus seres queridos. Las fotos te inspirarán a abrir tu propio corazón y a ver que el amor está en todas partes, en todos los aspectos de tu vida

 

100€ … BUD / KNOSPE / BROTE ...

Sounds of a loving heart to relax your body and your mind and to bring healing to your soul

Smoenjala´s heart frequencies are recorded and turned into music by a fascinating technique and made available to you as a download file

***

Klänge eines liebenden Herzens, um deinen Körper und deinen Geist zu relaxen und Heilung zu deiner Seele zu bringen

Smoenjala´s Herzfrequenzen werden aufgenommen, durch eine faszinierende Technik in Musik umgewandelt und dir als download file zur Verfügung gestellt

***

Los sonidos de un corazón lleno de amor para relajar el cuerpo y la mente y sanar al alma


Frecuencias cardíacas de Smoenjala están grabadas, convertidas a música a través de una tecnología fascinante y puestas a tu disposición como un archivo de descarga

 

300€ … BLOSSOM / BLÜTE / ESTAMPITA ...

A CD where Smoenjala connects to the “Golden Lifetree” and lets its frequencies flow through her heart and become music

In addition we are happy to send you a 15x15 postcard of the “Golden Lifetree” mother painting which was the inspiration for this music, both hand signed by Smoenjala

***

Eine CD wo Smoenjala sich mit dem “Goldenen Lebensbaum” verbindet und seine Frequenzen durch ihr Herz fließen läßt, um zu Musik zu werden

Zusätzlich gibt es eine 15x15 Postkarte des „Goldenen Lebensbaum“ Mutterbildes, welches die Inspiration für diese Musik war - beides handsigniert von Smoenjala

***

Un CD donde Smoenjala conecta con el "Árbol Dorado de la Vida" y deja fluir sus frecuencias a través de su corazón para convertirlas en música

Además estamos encantados de enviarte una postal de 15x15 del cuadro madre del “Árbol Dorado de la Vida”, que fue la inspiración para esta música – los dos firmados por Smoenjala

 

500€ … FRUIT / FRUCHT / FRUTA ...

 

The world is sound, rhythm and frequency, is information – and so is a painting. Smoenjala tunes into the information of her painting so its frequency is expressed by the rhythm of her heart and turned into sound. A CD of this symphony, accompanied by two A4 prints of Smoenjala´s paintings will give you a holistic, meditative experience.

The CD and prints are hand signed by Smoenjala.

***

Die Welt ist Klang, Rhythmus und Frequenz, ist Information – genau wie ein Bild. Smoenjala tuned sich ein in die Information ihres Bildes und so wird dessen Frequenz durch den Rhythmus ihres Herzens ausgedrückt und in Musik umwandelt. Die CD dieser Symphonie, zusammen mit zwei A4 Drucken dieser Bilder werden dich eine ganzheitliche, meditative Erfahrung machen lassen.

Die CD und die Drucke sind von Smoenjala handsigniert.

***

El mundo es sonido, ritmo y frecuencia,  es información - tanto como una pintura. Smoenjala sintoniza con la información de su cuadro, así la frecuencia se expresa por el ritmo de su corazón y está convertido en sonido. Un CD de esta sinfonía, acompañado de dos impresiones A4 de esas pinturas de Smoenjala le dará una holística experiencia meditativa.
El CD y los impresiones están firmados por Smoenjala.

 

1000€ … FOREST / WALD / BOSQUE

Four hand signed and numbered fine art prints (42x60) , certified to the name of the backer … this is the unique opportunity to welcome the full potential of all four force giving pillars of the “Golden Lifetree” project in your home, your heart, your soul.

***

Vier handsignierte und nummerierte Kunstdrucke (42x60), ausgestellt auf den Namen des Bieters … dies ist die einzigartige Gelegenheit das volle Potential aller vier kraftgebenden Säulen des „Goldenen Lebensbaum“ Projektes in deinem zu Hause, deinem Herzen und deiner Seele willkommen zu heißen.

***

Cuatro impresiones artísticas de alta cualidad (42x60), numeradas, firmadas y expedidas a nombre del postor ... está es una oportunidad única para dar la bienvenida a todo el potencial de los cuatro pilares que dan la fuerza al proyecto "Árbol  Dorado de la Vida" en tu casa, tu corazón, tu alma

 

2000€ … TREE / BAUM / ÁRBOL ...

The connection of heaven and earth, of human being and divine source finds its expression in a fine art collage of the first two force giving pillars of the “Golden Lifetree” project on stretched canvas (50x70).

The prints are hand signed, numbered and certified to the name of the backer. They go together with an invitation to an event where you can meet Smoenjala and where she´d be happy to express her gratitude personally.

***

Die Verbindung von Himmel und Erde, von menschlichem Wesen und göttlicher Quelle findet ihren Ausdruck in einer Kunstcollage auf Leinwand (50x70) der ersten zwei kraftgebenden Säulen des “Goldenen Lebensbaum” Projektes.

Die Drucke sind handsigniert, nummeriert und ausgestellt auf den Namen des Bieters. Sie gehen Hand in Hand mit einer Einladung zu einem Event wo man Smoenjala treffen kann und wo sie sehr gerne persönlich ihre Dankbarkeit ausdrücken möchte.

 ***

La conexión entre el cielo y la tierra, entre el ser humano y la fuente divina se expresa en un collage de bella arte sobre lienzo (50x70) de los dos primeros pilares que dan la fuerza al proyecto del “Árbol Dorado de la Vida”

Las impresiónes están firmadas, numeradas y expedidas a nombre del postor. Están acompañadas por una invitación a un evento donde se puede conocer a Smoenjala y donde ella sería encantada de expresar su gratitud personalmente.

 

5000€ … CROWN / KRONE / COPA DEL ÁRBOL

Our highest and most precious reward for you is a hand signed original painting (50x50). A “Blessing Picture” full of light, love, beauty and roses, the symbol of purity. This is hand signed, numbered and certified to your name.

This is also a one-of-a-kind opportunity to meet Smoenjala for a peaceful, heart to heart get together (according to prior agreement)

***

Unsere höchste und wertvollste Gratifikation ist ein Originalgemälde (50x50). Ein „Segen Bild" voller Licht, Liebe, Schönheit und Rosen, dem Symbol der Reinheit. Es ist handsigniert, nummeriert und ausgestellt auf deinen Namen.

Dies ist auch die einzigartige Gelegenheit, Smoenjala zu einem friedvollen, Herz-zu-Herz-Miteinader zu treffen.

***

Nuestra gratificación más valiosa y más preciada es una pintura original (50x50). Un "Cuadro de Bendición " lleno de luz, amor, belleza y rosas, el símbolo de la pureza. Está firmado, numerado y expedido a tu nombre.

Eso también es la oportunidad única para conocer a Smoenjala en un encuentro plácido, de corazón a corazón.

 

ACKNOWLEDGEMENT

All the love, energy, money and heart of us from the “Golden Lifetree” team flows into this project. So while preparing thiscampaign we also put a lot of heart, thought and work into the rewards we wanted to offer. So just as unique as our project are our rewards. They are not available anywhere else and only during this campaign.

For all the perks regarding invitations and meetings: travelling & accommodation is not included and they are subject to prior agreement

***

Alle Liebe, Energie, Geld und Herz von uns vom “Golden Lifetree” Team fließt in dieses Projekt. So haben wir, während wir diese Kampagne vorbereitet haben, auch eine Menge Herz, Gedanken und Arbeit in die perks getan, die wir euch anbieten wollten. Deshalb sind sie so einzigartig wie unser Projekt. Sie sind nirgendwo anders und nur während dieser Kampagne zu erhalten.

In allen perks, die sich auf Einladungen und Treffen beziehen, sind Reise- und Unterbringungskosten nicht beinhaltet und sie bedürfen vorheriger Absprache.  

***

Todo el amor, la energía, el dinero y el corazón de nosotras del equipo del "Golden Lifetree" desemboca en este proyecto. Así, durante la preparación de esta campaña también poníamos una gran cantidad de corazón, pensamientos y trabajo en las recompensas que queríamos ofrecer. Por lo tanto, nuestras gratificaciónes son tan únicas como nuestro proyecto mismo. Ellos no están disponibles en ningún otro lugar y sólo durante esta campaña.

Con respecto a las invitaciones y encuentros: los costes de viaje y alojamiento no están incluidos y requieren un acuerdo previo.
story_txt:
About The Golden Lifetree
a worldwide project for more light and love
The Lifetree is a map that helps people to get through the maze of life, right to their deepest core and their own highest truth. Throughout the project "Golden Lifetree" Smoenjala paints this very map around the world – branch by branch, root by root.This way over 500 paintings are composed together like dominoes to a giant Tree of Life, and thus universal love takes on the form of the “Golden Lifetree”. In addition, everywhere, where the caravan of the Golden Lifetree is welcome, Smoenjala paints a personal Tree of Life for the country. This way, expressed by the pictures, a light-grid of universal love embraces the globe.By purchasing these paintings, as well as by any other type of alternative support, you become a conscious co-creator of this light network, contribute to the growth of the tree of life as well as future projects. One of the fruits of the Golden Lifetree is to be a living “Healing Art Park”, with seminars, concerts, exhibitions, meditations, a holistic place of transformation, a "Garden of Eden" from the future in the NOW.In this garden, an integrated platform is created for children, on which they are supported in different ways to save and evolve their own divine creativity.Another fruit in the "Garden of Eden" is the Golden Pomegranate, a new kind of education space of new age consciousness and creativity through the art of empathy.… and so the Golden Lifetree always brings new flowers to bloom and new fruits to ripen …
 

Behind the scenes
the Initiator Smoenjala and the Golden Lifetree team
To make the Golden Lifetree blossom and ripe, for the last year, we, a small team of three people, have been dedicating all our love and energy, in volunteer work, have self-financed the project and brought it, to where it is now.
The first fruit that has come to ripen is our internet presence.
¡¡¡ www.GoldenLifetree.org came to see the light of day on April 25 2013!!!
The second fruit is what you are seeing here – the Golden Lifetree fundraising campaign. Presenting a worldwide project for more light and love requires a lot of light and love, thought and dedication, creativity and implementing capacity.  All this has been flowing into our campaign.   The next flower that is already blossoming and eagerly waiting to be manifested and turn into a fruit is the first Golden Lifetree exhibition from July 4th - 26th 2013 in San Sebastian de La Gomera (Canary Islands) which initiates the project of the Golden Lifetree.
So this is where we are at the moment. The Golden Lifetree Team has been working voluntarily and so did some of our helpers, from the bottom of their hearts, without anything in exchange. Some artists forgo the payment of their fees but need bed and breakfast. And some work will simply have to be paid. Until now, as we´ve already mentioned above, we´ve self-financed the project in endless hours of volunteer work but now we are about to take the next step, where the Golden Lifetree is to grow into and rise to its true greatness and full potential.

How you can support the project
and help spreading the seeds
You, of course, will want to know, where your money goes to, what it is used for so we have been creative to make it as easy as possible for anyone who wishes to support the growth of the Golden Lifetree and collected a list of ways to do so...  you can support the project through purchasing one or more of our exclusive perks here on indiegogo you can browse through the galleries on www.goldenlifetree.org, purchase paintings and other kinds of art, like music and there’s much more to come, so stay tuned!  you can help us in many different ways. on http://www.goldenlifetree.org/en/verwirklichung/ we created a list of areas in which we will need support on our journey to embrace the light-grid of universal love throughout the globe. Go check it out!   And you can always help to spread the seeds of the Golden Lifetree project throughout the world by sending a friendly link to this indigogo project to your friends and family or even organisations within your reach who you`d think might be interested in collaborating with us!
 

 
 
 
Just as unique as our project
and in three languages to make it as global as possible :-)
 
5€ … SEED / SAMEN / SEMILLA ...
Smoenjala says a heartwarming THANK YOU with a nicely designed digital postcard
***
Smoenjala sagt ein herzliches DANKESCHÖN mit einer schön gestalteten digitalen Postkarte
***
Smoenjala da las GRACIAS con una postal digital, designada con mucho cariño
 
10€ … SEEDLING / SETZLING / PANTÓN ...
A “Golden Lifetree” wallpaper for your screen will fill you with light and love while you are browsing and spreading the word
***
Ein “Goldener Lebensbaum” Desktophintergrund für deinen Bildschirm wird dich mit Licht und Liebe füllen während du surfst und die Nachricht verbreitest
***
Un „Árbol Dorado de la Vida“ fondo de escritorio para la pantalla te va a llenar con luz y amor mientras navegas y corres la voz
 

20€ … TWIG / ZWEIG / RAMITA ...
Day and night - two different expressions of the “Golden Lifetree” mother painting – open up new dimensions on your screen and in your soul
***
Tag & Nacht – zwei unterschiedliche Ausdrücke des Goldenen Lebensbaum Mutterbildes eröffnen neue Dimensionen auf deinem Bildschirm und in deiner Seele
***
Día & noche - dos expresiones diferentes del cuadro madre del “Árbol Dorado de la Vida" - abren nuevas dimensiones en la pantalla y en tu alma
 
30€ … BRANCH / AST / RAMA ...
Dive into a deeper understanding of your own divinity … 3 pictures will take you on a journey into the universe just by sitting in front of your pc
***
Tauche ein in ein tieferes Verständnis deiner eigenen Göttlichkeit ... 3 Bilder werden dich auf eine Reise ins Universum mitnehmen und das, während du einfach nur vor deinem PC sitzt
***
Sumérgete en una comprensión más profunda de tu propia divinidad ... 3 fotos te llevarán en un viaje por el universo con sólo sentarte frente a tu PC
 
50€ … ROOTS / WURZELN / RAÍCES ...
Visit the birthplace of the “Golden Lifetree” through the eyes of Smoenjala. 10 digital photos invite you to let your soul wonder through the wonders of La Gomera.
***
Besuche den Geburtsort des “Goldenen Lebensbaumes” durch die Augen von Smoenjala. 10 Fotos laden dich ein, deine Seele wandern zu lassen durch die Wunder La Gomeras
***
Visite el lugar de nacimiento del "Árbol Dorado de la Vida" a través de los ojos de Smoenjala. 10 fotografías que te invitan a dejar vagar tu alma por las maravillas de La Gomera
 
70€ … LEAF / BLATT / HOJA :::
… from heart to heart… 4 printable postcards from Smoenjala´s “heart collection” to send two your loved ones. The photos will inspire you to open up your own heart and see that love is all around you, in every aspect of your life
***
… von Herz zu Herz … 4 ausdruckbare Postkarten von Smoenjalas “Herz Sammlung”, um sie an deine Lieben zu versenden. Die Fotos werden dich inspirieren dein eigenes Herz zu öffnen und zu sehen, dass Liebe überall um dich herum ist, in jedem Aspekt deines Lebens
***
... De corazón a corazón ... 4 postales para imprimir de la "colección de corazónes" de Smoenjala para enviar a tus seres queridos. Las fotos te inspirarán a abrir tu propio corazón y a ver que el amor está en todas partes, en todos los aspectos de tu vida
 
100€ … BUD / KNOSPE / BROTE ...
Sounds of a loving heart to relax your body and your mind and to bring healing to your soul
Smoenjala´s heart frequencies are recorded and turned into music by a fascinating technique and made available to you as a download file
***
Klänge eines liebenden Herzens, um deinen Körper und deinen Geist zu relaxen und Heilung zu deiner Seele zu bringen
Smoenjala´s Herzfrequenzen werden aufgenommen, durch eine faszinierende Technik in Musik umgewandelt und dir als download file zur Verfügung gestellt
***
Los sonidos de un corazón lleno de amor para relajar el cuerpo y la mente y sanar al alma
 Frecuencias cardíacas de Smoenjala están grabadas, convertidas a música a través de una tecnología fascinante y puestas a tu disposición como un archivo de descarga
 

300€ … BLOSSOM / BLÜTE / ESTAMPITA ...
A CD where Smoenjala connects to the “Golden Lifetree” and lets its frequencies flow through her heart and become music
In addition we are happy to send you a 15x15 postcard of the “Golden Lifetree” mother painting which was the inspiration for this music, both hand signed by Smoenjala
***
Eine CD wo Smoenjala sich mit dem “Goldenen Lebensbaum” verbindet und seine Frequenzen durch ihr Herz fließen läßt, um zu Musik zu werden
Zusätzlich gibt es eine 15x15 Postkarte des „Goldenen Lebensbaum“ Mutterbildes, welches die Inspiration für diese Musik war - beides handsigniert von Smoenjala
***
Un CD donde Smoenjala conecta con el "Árbol Dorado de la Vida" y deja fluir sus frecuencias a través de su corazón para convertirlas en música
Además estamos encantados de enviarte una postal de 15x15 del cuadro madre del “Árbol Dorado de la Vida”, que fue la inspiración para esta música – los dos firmados por Smoenjala
 
500€ … FRUIT / FRUCHT / FRUTA ...
 
The world is sound, rhythm and frequency, is information – and so is a painting. Smoenjala tunes into the information of her painting so its frequency is expressed by the rhythm of her heart and turned into sound. A CD of this symphony, accompanied by two A4 prints of Smoenjala´s paintings will give you a holistic, meditative experience.
The CD and prints are hand signed by Smoenjala.
***
Die Welt ist Klang, Rhythmus und Frequenz, ist Information – genau wie ein Bild. Smoenjala tuned sich ein in die Information ihres Bildes und so wird dessen Frequenz durch den Rhythmus ihres Herzens ausgedrückt und in Musik umwandelt. Die CD dieser Symphonie, zusammen mit zwei A4 Drucken dieser Bilder werden dich eine ganzheitliche, meditative Erfahrung machen lassen.
Die CD und die Drucke sind von Smoenjala handsigniert.
***
El mundo es sonido, ritmo y frecuencia,  es información - tanto como una pintura. Smoenjala sintoniza con la información de su cuadro, así la frecuencia se expresa por el ritmo de su corazón y está convertido en sonido. Un CD de esta sinfonía, acompañado de dos impresiones A4 de esas pinturas de Smoenjala le dará una holística experiencia meditativa. El CD y los impresiones están firmados por Smoenjala.
 
1000€ … FOREST / WALD / BOSQUE
Four hand signed and numbered fine art prints (42x60) , certified to the name of the backer … this is the unique opportunity to welcome the full potential of all four force giving pillars of the “Golden Lifetree” project in your home, your heart, your soul.
***
Vier handsignierte und nummerierte Kunstdrucke (42x60), ausgestellt auf den Namen des Bieters … dies ist die einzigartige Gelegenheit das volle Potential aller vier kraftgebenden Säulen des „Goldenen Lebensbaum“ Projektes in deinem zu Hause, deinem Herzen und deiner Seele willkommen zu heißen.
***
Cuatro impresiones artísticas de alta cualidad (42x60), numeradas, firmadas y expedidas a nombre del postor ... está es una oportunidad única para dar la bienvenida a todo el potencial de los cuatro pilares que dan la fuerza al proyecto "Árbol  Dorado de la Vida" en tu casa, tu corazón, tu alma
 

2000€ … TREE / BAUM / ÁRBOL ...
The connection of heaven and earth, of human being and divine source finds its expression in a fine art collage of the first two force giving pillars of the “Golden Lifetree” project on stretched canvas (50x70).
The prints are hand signed, numbered and certified to the name of the backer. They go together with an invitation to an event where you can meet Smoenjala and where she´d be happy to express her gratitude personally.
***
Die Verbindung von Himmel und Erde, von menschlichem Wesen und göttlicher Quelle findet ihren Ausdruck in einer Kunstcollage auf Leinwand (50x70) der ersten zwei kraftgebenden Säulen des “Goldenen Lebensbaum” Projektes.
Die Drucke sind handsigniert, nummeriert und ausgestellt auf den Namen des Bieters. Sie gehen Hand in Hand mit einer Einladung zu einem Event wo man Smoenjala treffen kann und wo sie sehr gerne persönlich ihre Dankbarkeit ausdrücken möchte.
 ***
La conexión entre el cielo y la tierra, entre el ser humano y la fuente divina se expresa en un collage de bella arte sobre lienzo (50x70) de los dos primeros pilares que dan la fuerza al proyecto del “Árbol Dorado de la Vida”
Las impresiónes están firmadas, numeradas y expedidas a nombre del postor. Están acompañadas por una invitación a un evento donde se puede conocer a Smoenjala y donde ella sería encantada de expresar su gratitud personalmente.
 
5000€ … CROWN / KRONE / COPA DEL ÁRBOL
Our highest and most precious reward for you is a hand signed original painting (50x50). A “Blessing Picture” full of light, love, beauty and roses, the symbol of purity. This is hand signed, numbered and certified to your name.
This is also a one-of-a-kind opportunity to meet Smoenjala for a peaceful, heart to heart get together (according to prior agreement)
***
Unsere höchste und wertvollste Gratifikation ist ein Originalgemälde (50x50). Ein „Segen Bild" voller Licht, Liebe, Schönheit und Rosen, dem Symbol der Reinheit. Es ist handsigniert, nummeriert und ausgestellt auf deinen Namen.
Dies ist auch die einzigartige Gelegenheit, Smoenjala zu einem friedvollen, Herz-zu-Herz-Miteinader zu treffen.
***
Nuestra gratificación más valiosa y más preciada es una pintura original (50x50). Un "Cuadro de Bendición " lleno de luz, amor, belleza y rosas, el símbolo de la pureza. Está firmado, numerado y expedido a tu nombre.
Eso también es la oportunidad única para conocer a Smoenjala en un encuentro plácido, de corazón a corazón.
 
ACKNOWLEDGEMENT
All the love, energy, money and heart of us from the “Golden Lifetree” team flows into this project. So while preparing thiscampaign we also put a lot of heart, thought and work into the rewards we wanted to offer. So just as unique as our project are our rewards. They are not available anywhere else and only during this campaign.
For all the perks regarding invitations and meetings: travelling & accommodation is not included and they are subject to prior agreement
***
Alle Liebe, Energie, Geld und Herz von uns vom “Golden Lifetree” Team fließt in dieses Projekt. So haben wir, während wir diese Kampagne vorbereitet haben, auch eine Menge Herz, Gedanken und Arbeit in die perks getan, die wir euch anbieten wollten. Deshalb sind sie so einzigartig wie unser Projekt. Sie sind nirgendwo anders und nur während dieser Kampagne zu erhalten.
In allen perks, die sich auf Einladungen und Treffen beziehen, sind Reise- und Unterbringungskosten nicht beinhaltet und sie bedürfen vorheriger Absprache.  
***
Todo el amor, la energía, el dinero y el corazón de nosotras del equipo del "Golden Lifetree" desemboca en este proyecto. Así, durante la preparación de esta campaña también poníamos una gran cantidad de corazón, pensamientos y trabajo en las recompensas que queríamos ofrecer. Por lo tanto, nuestras gratificaciónes son tan únicas como nuestro proyecto mismo. Ellos no están disponibles en ningún otro lugar y sólo durante esta campaña.
Con respecto a las invitaciones y encuentros: los costes de viaje y alojamiento no están incluidos y requieren un acuerdo previo.

story:
Hi, my name is Kahlil Robert Irving, a Junior at the Kansas City Art Institute.  I would like to take this time to share with you a wonderful opportunity in which I have to spend a semester abroad studying and working at the International Ceramics Studio (ICS) near Budapest, Hungary. You can see examples of my works in the gallery tab above. Also on my WEBSITE - http://kahlilirving.wordpress.com/portfolio-2/undergraduate/ This will become an awesome crossroads in my design work as I spent a month at the studio during the summer of 2012 studying under my ceramics professor George Timock.  During my time at the ICS I met internationally renowned ceramics artist Ilona Romule. I spent many hours with Ms. Romule which greatly broadened my perspective as an artist and the time that I spent at the ICS inspired me to look deeper into what I really want to share with the world as both an artist and as an individual.  I learned and saw examples of complex mold designs and how industry influences studio ceramic work on a perpetual basis.  Consequently, this international study opportunity has become of great interest to me and is what I would like to present as a basis for the collection making up my senior thesis.  Exploring the use of the mold more in-depth to create objects that solidify an idea of the various architectural elements in which I have once lived is on the forefront of my thinking.  Utilizing the solid white and sheer translucent porcelain strictly used at the ICS in combination with the element of light and various techniques such as sgraffito, china paint, and gold luster I will create a sort of transitory place for the viewer to create implied dimension into my own personal narrative and historical timeline of lifetime events.

Working at the ICS will help polish my artistic skills as a ceramicist due to the participation in individualized workshops designed for established makers in all types of artistic media.  I will be able to also work on and develop my own ceramic collections which as I discussed previously is of the utmost importance.  Developing my skills as an artist will be taken to a whole new realm being immersed in another culture, as well as being surrounded by a diverse group of artists and their unique ideals.  The ability to work alongside these artists who will bring their unique perspectives, experiences, and cultural backgrounds will significantly help broaden my scope and this will be just the beginning of the excitement of my journey.  I also hope to influence other students with my dedication to self-improvement, hard work, and with the story of the hardships I have overcome to become who I am today.

These six months in Hungary will become an invaluable addition to my creative and intellectual development.  It what would normally take many years to gain this type of artistic experience, this trip will help expedite some of the learning process in a matter of a few months.  Everything that I learn and experience will be shared with others so that they may too be influenced to take creative risks as I have learned to do here at the Kansas City Art Institute. Ultimately, this semester abroad will help me to attain my goal of refining my skills as a ceramic artist in order to create beautifully crafted objects that express my ideas in a way that is both innovative and cutting edge as well as grounded in the historical tradition of ceramics.  Most of all, this trip will help to prepare me for the next step in my journey- my Master’s Degree.

I am requesting monetary support that would allow me to embark on this journey.  The funds for this project cover all expenses for my semester overseas: plane ticket, accommodations, material and firing fees, individual workshop fees, technical mold assistance and meals at the center.  All donors will receive a piece of art from my life and I will keep you posted via blog and my Facebook page.  My extended parents Jeff and Emily Tofaute will be sponsoring a senior thesis showing sometime in the late spring of 2014 in St. Louis, MO and I would be most grateful for you to come and see my collection of work I am so ardently yet zealously putting together.  It's going to be one awesome show! Thank you so much for your time and consideration.

Sincerely,

Kahlil Robert Irving

story:
Hey Everyone, my name's Chad.

   For the longest time I've had essentially 2 passions:Video Games and Woodworking. My entire life I've been influenced by woodworking by my family and friends and have always been around tools and love to build. During High-School I also learned a bit of carving/widdling/sculpting. As far as video games go I have many favorites but "The Legend of Zelda" has always been my top pick.
 Since then, I'm the proud father of my little 18mo son and have another bundle on the way. Times have been a bit tough since my wife has not been working and I've been a bit distracted with work and fatherhood. I've been trying to find myself and finally, I've figured it out. Combining both passions. I plan on making tons of different Zelda inspired wooden items. At the moment the current project is all Ocarina of Time medallions.
  You're contributions to allow me to start this project would mean the world to me because not only would I be doing what I love but it helps my entire family to continue to grow and get my small business off the ground one day.

What We Need:
   So to break it down simply, the funding goal is $600.00 and will be used for the following:
-$200.00 for wood material (I get it inexpensivly so that can get my quite a bit)
-$400.00 for equipment which includes:Dremel tool bits, Electric Jig Saw, Clamps, Paints, Stains, etc.
   I've always been good with my hands and this project will be a perfect chance for me to showcase to the world my talents and make these medallions truly incredible with depth and complex angles.
   If I don't reach my goal of $600.00 the funds are all still going to be used towards materials and equipment that I need. I would use what I get to save for the tools I need to start this as soon as I can!

What You Get:
   Any donations are welcome of course and here is what I can do for you if you do. Obviously they will get better with time.
-Donations of 20$ or less: $10.00 off any Medallion
-Donations of $20 - $50: $30.00 off any Medallion
-Donations $50 - $100: $40.00 off any Medallion
-Donations over $100.00: FREE Medallion

The Goal:
Gamers love games and this gives me a chance to make parts of a series many love to life. The Medallions will be scale replica of the ones in "Ocarina of Time" and will be collectible. I'm also making some custom special medallions as shown above. Being able to do this will certainly contribute to the world of collecting game articles and is gonna be lots of fun!

   Remember, even if you can't donate, ANY help is incredibly helpful. If you like my idea and would like to see this made please Share this project to Facebook, Twitter, even right on this website. Anything is highly apreciated =)

Thank you all again for stopping by!

story:
Short Summary

Hey folks its Charlie Harding, porn star, art model and all around good guy!  I'm super excited to announce I've planned out four new tattoos that I want to have done!  Now you can help create the canvas you'll see on film in my upcoming scenes!  This funding will cover at least the first of the four!

What We Need & What You Get

This funding will go to finish my right forearm ink right now I have the Dead Walker symbol from the sci fi show Caprica on that arm, and a crop circle image. I want to fill in the rest of the space with additional imagery from sci fi TV shows and crop cricle images I've pulled from all over the world!

So you have a chance to make art on my body and tell folks you helped me ink my skin!  Here's what you can get in return:

$25 donations will get a signed professionally taken photograph of my with the new ink with my autograph!

$50 donations will get (assuming the donor is over the legal age for adult content in their state) a fully nude erotic photo of me displaying my new ink with autograph and personal message!

$100 donations will get the $50 photo, and a short thank you video emailed to you!

$250 donations get  the $50 photo and a 15 minute live Skype call to chat and allow us to meet and me to show off for you!

$500 donations or more get the $50 photo, the 15 minute Skype call and the chance to have a drink or coffee if we can coordinate a time to be in the same city!

The Impact

As an adult film star, I constantly have to reinvent and maintain my body and its look.  This is tough to do, and I unfortunately am very hyper critical of myself because of it.  Helping me get the newe tattoos, makes me feel better about myself, gives you a chance to say thank you for the work I've done that you've enjoyed, and gives us a connection and something to get excited about!

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help! Help me get the word out about my campain!  Tweet, email, facebook about it!
story_txt:
Short Summary
Hey folks its Charlie Harding, porn star, art model and all around good guy!  I'm super excited to announce I've planned out four new tattoos that I want to have done!  Now you can help create the canvas you'll see on film in my upcoming scenes!  This funding will cover at least the first of the four!


What We Need & What You Get
This funding will go to finish my right forearm ink right now I have the Dead Walker symbol from the sci fi show Caprica on that arm, and a crop circle image. I want to fill in the rest of the space with additional imagery from sci fi TV shows and crop cricle images I've pulled from all over the world!
So you have a chance to make art on my body and tell folks you helped me ink my skin!  Here's what you can get in return:
$25 donations will get a signed professionally taken photograph of my with the new ink with my autograph!
$50 donations will get (assuming the donor is over the legal age for adult content in their state) a fully nude erotic photo of me displaying my new ink with autograph and personal message!
$100 donations will get the $50 photo, and a short thank you video emailed to you!
$250 donations get  the $50 photo and a 15 minute live Skype call to chat and allow us to meet and me to show off for you!
$500 donations or more get the $50 photo, the 15 minute Skype call and the chance to have a drink or coffee if we can coordinate a time to be in the same city!


The Impact
As an adult film star, I constantly have to reinvent and maintain my body and its look.  This is tough to do, and I unfortunately am very hyper critical of myself because of it.  Helping me get the newe tattoos, makes me feel better about myself, gives you a chance to say thank you for the work I've done that you've enjoyed, and gives us a connection and something to get excited about!

story:
Hi! I'm Mary!
I am a young paper-maker and sculptor on my way to refining my craft and achieving my Masters at the University of Iowa's Dimensional Practices Program.  To help fund my move to the university I am harnessing my craft to offer you various artisan papers and sculptures!

All Perks will be made on site at the University on both my personal and University equipment. All items are unique, and handmade. 
 
All Perks and Appreciation will be shipped late September and include pictorial updates on my forthcoming personal blog to document my journey.
 
Each perk level reflects a higher level of craftsmanship so the more you contribute the more unique your item will be. 
 
About Me
I grew up in Iowa on a farm with a passion for nature and art. The creative possibilities of the natural world have always been captivating and endless for me. I believe in the ability of nature to heal people and the world.  I fell in love with paper-making while getting my BFA at the School of the Art Institute of Chicago and after graduation I passed on my passion by training homeless women in stationary-making as job training. As a result these women gained self-confidence, learned how to express themselves, became employed, and had a renewed sense of possibility.

Your Impact
This is my first step in starting my own business producing paper goods for the enjoyment of all. With each contribution I'll be that much closer to making that goal a reality.


$1 - A long distance hug and warm glowing feelings! 
 
$15 - A personalized thank you card signed with a liipstick kiss of appreciation.

$30 - The personalized thank you card + 2 mid-size sheets of handmade artisan paper prepared in Japanese-style moulds.
 
$50 - The personalized thank you card + 6 handmade envelopes made using of hand marbled paper and scented with essential oils.
 
$100 - The personalized thank you card + a small hand-bound book.
 
$150 - The personalized thank you card + a small sculpture made with paper made by hand and hand dyed.  Wall-mounting hardware included.

$500.00- Original large format, abstract sculpture of hand processed Abaca fiber (a relative of the banana plant), and dyed reed in a rich blue-red. Dyes are all natural, non-toxic, and do not fade with time. Complete with mounting hardware + Thank-you. 

If full funding is not achieved, Perks will still be awarded and donations will still be used toward moving/renting expenses.

 

The Impact

Your support is important because it helps me achieve my goal of making the world a better place. Obtaining my degree is a step on the path toward a career in helping others and providing lasting enjoyment through sustainable beauty. 

My ultimate goal is to establish a sustainable business similar to that which inspired me.

In addition to starting a business I also plan to teach paper and sculpture at the college level to inspire creativity and lead the next generation of artists.

Other Ways You Can Help

If it isn't possible for you to donate, don't worry! 

Please pass on the word to friends, co-workers, relatives, even strangers! Word of mouth is the curreny of possibility.

Post on Facebook, Twitter, Linkedin-any social media, and please use the share options here on Indiegogo.

 

Let's make the world more beautiful, sustainable, and enjoyable for all!

story:
A SPANKING NEW LOGO FOR YOU AND AN EXCITING PROJECT FOR ME. WIN WIN!

Hey I'm Dina, an entrepreneur building a new graphic design company called Logo Juice. My team of graphic designers have over 10 years experience in logo development and we are passionate about creating top notch branding solutions for both companies and start ups alike.

Before we launch our new website morelogojuiceplease.com, we want to start off this new venture with a bang by offering our services at highly discounted rates! Our goal is to create 100 logos in 100 days to help fill our portfolio page with high quality design. 

Once this crowd funding campaign ends and our website is live, our prices will go up over $300! I can guarantee you that you won't find a better deal and a higher quality design service then this anywhere. 

EVERY SINGLE BACKER IS GETTING A ONE OF A KIND LOGO!

In the big sea of advertising, it is especially tough to set your brand apart. Let’s be honest. Marketing is expensive and for the most part a lot of the logos out there are rushed, thoughtless and just darn right ugly. 

Your business is your baby and you want that baby to shine! Help me build my Logo Juice portfolio and I promise to help make your business stand out from the crowd. Each morning I want to pour myself a cup of Logo Juice for my daily serving of spectacular design.

Each backer will receive their logo in the following final formats; png, pdf, and vector eps. Once all of the logos are complete they will be published at morelogojuiceplease.com for the world to see. Your logo will link to the url of your choice. This not only gives you an awesome online shout out for customers to find your business, but it also contributes to your websites positive SEO. 

As a special bonus backers will also receive access to my custom lettering wallpaper page. There my backers can download different motivational type wallpapers for all of their smart devices and computers. These wallpapers will be produced while this campaign is live. 

TOGETHER WE CAN FILL THE WORLD WITH QUALITY DESIGN.

If you want to learn more about me and my design skills, please visit dinamariecreative.com. Thank you so much for taking the time to check out my Indiegogo campaign. Be sure to share this page on your twitter, facebook, instagram and other social media platforms to show your support. 

For any additional questions feel free to email me at contact@morelogojuiceplease.com

Q&A

I'VE RECEIVED SOME QUESTIONS ABOUT THIS PROJECT AND I AM HAPPY TO ANWSER.

1. Do I have full rights to this logo and can I post it anywhere?

- Yes! There is no additional fee to own your logo. I will never charge extra for you to have the working files to your logo. 

2. Can I come to you after I receive my approved logo to make changes?

- Of course. Depending on the change it could be just an additional $10 fee. 

3. Do you just start designing or do we have a project discussion first?

- Every backer will receive a ' Logo Design Questionnaire' prior to me starting on the design, so I can hit the mark the first time. 

4. When do you start designing my logo?

- As much as I want to get started right away, I need to wait till the project on Indiegogo is complete. On September 6th, I will begin my 100 day design challenge. I recommend purchasing the 'FAST DELIVERY LOGO + 1 CHANGE' so you can have your new logo in hand within the first 2 weeks. 

5. What happens if your campaign does not reach your intended goal?

- No matter what number of backers I reach or money gained, all backers are receiving their logos. This campaign will continue if it's 30 logos in 30 days or 100 in 100 days.

story:
A mini bit about me -

I'm going into University to study Digital animation, I have grown up passionate about Disney which led to my obsession with films and cartoons in general.

It's taken me years to work up my ability to draw and I still strive to raise my standard, by creating these characters it's helped me become more diverse in my designing and my skills in general.

It is a long term goal of mine to create a brand that has a range of accessories and that is recognized by a wide variety audience. 

Eventually a percentage of the money I raise will be donated to charity. This is something I'm still looking into, and will make a choice nearer the time.


MiniYuus?

I started creating MiniYuus for friends and family as a hobby...

The batch that started it all -

I have continued to create them for other people using representative photos and short descriptions.They take around an hour or two to create, all hand drawn and every single one is unique.

How can you help?

All contributions will help me raise the funds necessary to get through university. Along with future merchandise such as shirts, bookmarks etc... 

These creations have already caught a lot of peoples attention and I have created over one hundred original MiniYuu characters. I continue to have many people interested and would love to spread the word about my mini creations further.

You can check out and like my FaceBook page: https://www.facebook.com/MiniYuu

Which would be a great help if not anything else, thank you for your time, and every single person who has liked my page so far.


Example work - 

A basic bookmark, featuring a small animal design -

A sketch of a character - (Would add more detail to personalise)

A single MiniYuu character -

One of my first family MiniYuu portraits -

     


Thank you for taking an interest in my work, and I hope this will encourage me to keep improving on these guys as well as my art work in general.

story:
Ramona's Art Investment Campaign
 

I am an artist. I am intensely passionate about my work and have big plans for my future. Over the past year I have surprised myself with my strength and determination to move forward not only in my life but in my career as an artist. This strength and determination did not come easy...but was well worth it. I made the decision to leave everything I know on the west coast and move to Toronto in January of this year to pursue my art career. Creating art is what I do and I want to keep doing it. Over the past 6 months I have been in several shows and will continue to exhibit. I work full time during the day and paint full time at night. I know what I can accomplish but need your assistance.

I require your investment so that I can invest the time and energy needed to create new work for future group and solo exhibits. Creating can be difficult when you do not have the means to make it happen and to keep moving forward with your ideas. Your investment will assist me with future show entry costs, studio costs, photography costs, paint costs, canvas costs, promotional costs and to give me the ability to participate in some of the larger art shows both here in Toronto and in New York and Los Angeles.

 

I have created a wide range of investment options and I welcome all of you to follow me and my work as I progress to the next stage of my career.

Can't afford to contribute? No problem! You can help by sharing this investment opportunity using the share tools provided. 



I am an artist on a mission....and nothing is going to stop me.

story:
Our Story

Harlots & Hooligans is a free edgy, uncensored magazine based out of Baton Rouge, LA and distributed bi-monthly.  We  feature local artists, musicians, enthusiasts, & events in our area as well as out-of-town artists and tattoo conventions in surrounding states in every release. Each issue is guaranteed to be packed with mind-blowing artists of every media, tattoo shops, musicians, and your very own tattoo photos. Harlots & Hooligans take pride in keeping a face in the public to find out what the reader wants to see next! We have tattoos worth taking a look at, bands worth giving an ear, and award winning artists you don't want to miss! We are dedicated to serving artists of every genre.


During the era of viral videos, smart phones, social networking, and all around technological advances why would we want to start a new magazine? A magazine is something people READ! Who does that these days?  Well, we're here to bring printed publications back in style with amazing art, talented musicians, and tattoo shops and artists worth your time and money.  


We decided to create Harlots & Hooligans in February 2011 after realizing that South Louisiana needs some way to connect with the hidden,raw culture in our area. There is so much talent hidden within the state that no one knows about; we want to make it known! We want to show everyone the artists, musicians, stylists, and THE CULTURE that exists right here in South Louisiana!  We also connect with big name artists across the nation and feature their stories and art work in each and every issue as well as travel to conventions and events to let you know what's going.   This isn't your typical tattoo & music magazine. We bring focus on the art, not just the people.  It isn't about who's the hottest cover model, it's about who's the hottest artist that you want to hang their work in your living room or even more complimentary, your skin!   We bring attention to the skills that lie within these individuals.   We're committed to creating the most kick-ass FREE magazine yet to be seen.

The Impact

Harlots & Hooligans is currently strictly funded by local advertisers. We are dedicated to supporting local business and artists of every genre in order to give back to our community. by donating to our cause you will assist in the ever expanding cost of printing, allow more growth within our company to expand the size of the magazine as well as continue our level of expectation for picture quality and contributing artists. Donations from this campaign will also assist in establish an all inclusive website that will provide more to our fans. With this website fans will be hooked up with merchandise, links, artists bio, updates,  and online PDF subscriptions. 


What We Need & What You Get


To make Harlots & Hooligans bigger and better we need to increase our printing quantity in order to better meet the needs of our fan base. We are rapidly growing and with this growth comes a bigger bill!

We need an operating website to reach our fans and provide a better online quality of viewing for each issue and ordering services.  Plus, Harlots & Hooligans isn't just for Louisiana residents. We have fans all over the country and provide subscription packages for only $12.00 per year!


If you have an online ordering business or accessible products you can also benefit from our amazing advertising packages. Even if we don't reach our goal, every little bit will help us to continue improving and make this magazine a success!



Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't donate at least check us out on Facebook by searching Harlots & Hooligans. You can also purchase an advertisement or magazine subscription by contacting HARLOTSANDHOOLIGANS@LIVE.COM

story:
Nestled improbably on Pollepel (or Polopel) Island, in the middle of the Hudson River, are the ruins of a castle. The image of this decrepit landmark, in sharp relief against a natural landscape that is still very much alive, evokes a sense of lost time, decay and otherworldliness.

CONSTELLATION, a major new public art project by internationally recognized artist Melissa McGill, will transform this ruin into a poetic and poignant experience for today’s explorers. The large–scale sculptural installation brings together light and form, and connects history to the present day. Small solar powered LED lights atop a series of 17 slender, tapered aluminum poles will be installed at heights ranging from 40 to 80 feet. Hovering around the perimeter of a castle ruin, these points of light refer to features of a structure still standing, as well the structure that once was. For approximately 2 hours each night, as the sun sets, a new constellation will merge one by one with stars in the night sky.

Reaching further back into the past, CONSTELLATION references a belief of the Lenape, the indigenous / native Americans of the area, of Opitemakan, the “White Road” or “Milky Way” connecting our world with the next.

CONSTELLATION’s premiere date is planned for June 2015. Its projected lifespan is 2-3 years. A companion book will be published, excerpts from which will be used in audio guide that is being created for the installation by a 6-time Grammy-winning digital publishing producer. 

Melissa McGill draws attention to what could be called "found space." Working primarily with preexisting images and objects and the space within and around them, she renders these hidden voids into sculptural form. CONSTELLATION is Melissa's largest public art installation to date and invites a large and diverse audience to engage with this abandoned place in new and unexpected ways.

CONSTELLATION celebrates the natural beauty of the Hudson Valley and synthesizes the region’s potential for more interactivity with it. The installation, set approximately 1,000 feet from the Hudson's shoreline, will have many vantage points on both sides of the river -- in Putnam, Dutchess and Orange counties. Many more people will be able to view CONSTELLATION from north and southbound trains, several nearby hiking trails, roadways, and by boat and kayaks.

installed at heights ranging from 40 to 80 feet. Hovering around the perimeter of a castle ruin, these points of light refer to features of a structure still standing, as well the structure that once was. For approximately 2 hours each night, as the sun sets, a new constellation will merge one by one with stars in the night sky.Reaching further back into the past, CONSTELLATION references a belief of the Lenape, the indigenous / native Americans of the area, of Opitemakan, the “White Road” or “Milky Way” connecting our world with the next. CONSTELLATION’s
premiere date is planned for June 2015. Its projected lifespan is 2-3
years. A companion book will be published, excerpts from which will be used in audio guide that is being created for the installation by a 6-time Grammy-winning digital publishing producer. Melissa McGill draws attention to what could be called "found space." Working primarily with preexisting images and objects and the space within and around them, she renders these hidden voids into sculptural form. CONSTELLATION is Melissa's largest public art installation to date and invites a large and diverse audience to engage with this abandoned place in new and unexpected ways.CONSTELLATION celebrates
the natural beauty of the Hudson Valley and synthesizes the region’s potential
for more interactivity with it. The installation, set approximately 1,000 feet from the Hudson's shoreline, will
have many vantage points on both sides of the river -- in Putnam, Dutchess and
Orange counties. Many more people will be able to view CONSTELLATION from north
and southbound trains, several nearby hiking trails, roadways, and by boat and kayaks.

story:
GREETINGS!

I am Joe Frontel, owner and creator of JF DECKS, an Independently run custom skateboard-design company that produces hand designed wood burnt skateboards. I started this idea about 2 years ago when i moved to Brooklyn, NY from St. Petersburg, FL, as a way to still make work while living in a small space. Growing up skating I always had a draw toward the graphics and aesthetics on the bottom. In Brooklyn, I saw a way to combine handmade fine art with skateboarding to make one-of-a-kind pieces to be hung or skated.

These are one-of-a-kind pieces, I have been doing pyrography (wood-burning) for about 4 years now to make these and have been using the same tool i purchased at Wal-Mart for $20. I have been recieving a lot of attention for the work lately and need to up the ante! Having a more professional wood burning machine would allow me to create higher quality work, and ideally be able to crank out more pieces so more ideas can reach more people.

This campaign is a way for donators to contribute to a DIY skateboard design company, assist me in getting legitimate equipment & supplies, and a chance to recieve original artwork from me in return. Your contributions will be the catalyst to help me turn this passion of mine into a real business!

 

 

THE SITCH

The donations will go toward making you happy! How does that work? Well I would love to send you custom art work created by me in exchange for your donation. That should do the trick.

Check out the Perks section for how it breaks down, and how you can get a chance to purchase some art!

But for real:

Donations will help me raise money to pay for a professional wood burning machine, stock up on blank skateboards, non-yellowing UV coating for the pieces, as well as be able to purchase shirts to send out for you all. 

Even if the goal is not met, WHO CARES!? You will still recieve the perk you purchased and will forever go down in my heart as a real deal friend. ANY, I mean, ANY way you can help out would be influential to producing more quality art work. Thank you in advance!

 

SPREAD THE WORD, BIRD!

If you found the work to be interesting and REALLY REALLY REALLY want to contribute but don't have the means, NO WORRIES! Please just spread the word. 

I honestly hope this project gets the word out on what I do even if the goal is not met. Befriend me on Facebook at www.facebook.com/JfDecks or check out my work on my website www.joefrontel.com.

ALSO if you would like to purchase any work seen on the site or want to talk to me directly, please don't hesistate to hit me up: joe.frontel@gmail.com.


THAAAAAAAANKS

story:
(ENG + CZ FRIENDLY!  The entirety of this book has been translated into Czech.)

So you went back to the land of your ancestors, reconnected to a past that you knew little about and then made art about it?  


Exactly! Let me give you a bit of the backstory.

In the fall of 2009 I was invited to Tábor – a small town in the Czech Republic that most of us have probably never heard of, to do a month-long artist residency in a country I had always longed to get to. This is the same country that 90 years before my own great grandmother, “Old Grandma” as we lovingly called her, boarded a train, and then a ship, and left behind forever. 

On the day that I was leaving Canada I heard a voice, a tiny voice in my head, that whispered, “you’re going home.” 

Home? 

For those of you who don’t know me, it’s these kinds of signs and synchroncities that I pay attention to. For years, I had wondered about this not-so-distant past, about this land that Old Grandma seemed to long for, and about a language that was quickly losing its place in our family. I had even made paintings and performances to try to reconnect to it.

So there I was, standing in proximity to the soil where she once stood, with paintbrushes in hand and a burning desire to understand this place and the past. Not long after, I even found myself standing in the very room where my grandfather was born.

Field Guide to the Czech Psyche was created in this magical realm where the past, my family and my constant wonderings about how we come to be who we are, all came together. It is a collection of notes taken, interviews made and paintings created while I walked this field.

 

 

How it looked and what it is:

During the course of two and half years I talked extensively to nine Czech people. I asked them about everything that I longed to know about this place and all the things that as an outsider, I had permission to ask. This project is about a place, but it is also about something bigger, ancient and much more profound. It is about the pieces of life that make us who we are. It is an investigation into the threads that matter and the things that stick.

This book is personal yes, but it is also more general and recognizes the things that either fall away, refuse to leave or end up being born in some other place altogether.

Nearly three years later, this book, this labour of love, this collection of paintings have all been completed, lovingly edited, translated and readied for print. 

Your generous donations will help to bring this project full circle by sending it to press.  It will also help to create a space where others can explore these magical, known and unknown landscapes and discover their own clues to who we are, how we came to be, and quite possibly, where we’re going. 

  

Lucie with In Conversation with Lucie, photo by Daniela Dostálková.

 


How will the funding be used? 

Three-quarters of the money donated will be used to print the beautifully bound, hard-covered books, designed by the amazing Linda Dostálková, and the 10 poster-sized reproductions of each of the 10 paintings that will accompany them. 

The rest of the funding will cover the cost of design, the gorgeous photographs of both the art and the interviewees taken by the uber-talented Daniela Dostálková, the final proofreading, and the shipping costs associated with sending out all the gorgeous rewards, and…

... it will help to fund the first exhibition of this book and the 10 paintings, which are scheduled to be debuted in Prague, this spring from May 23 – June 24 at the Běhal Fejér Institute. Anything extra will help to put this project on tour!

 

Eva with In Conversation with Eva, photo by Daniela Dostálková.

 

The gorgeous rewards:  

My sincerest gratitude:

In return for you generous support I’ve prepared some beautiful rewards, all of which include gigantic amounts of gratitude, delivered to you either virtually, or the old-fashioned way with a gorgeous stamp from Prague.

 

 

Clothe the Naked Baby + learn how to run your own crowdfunding campaign:

I don't just want you to contribute to my cause, I also want to contribute to yours. I’ve created this very special e-course, called Clothe the Naked Baby + learn how to run your own Crowdfunding Campaign. For just $15 you’ll receive daily, yes daily, tips, tricks and behind-the-scenes looks at how to set up your own campaign and give birth to the miraculous creative visions that you’re here to make. I won’t hold anything back. I believe in you. 

 

 

In Conversation with Vítek, mixed media on board, 122cm x 70cm, 2010.


Your own, signed copy of the Field Guide to the Czech Psyche:

For $25 you’ll receive a hot off the press copy of the beautifully designed, content-rich, Field Guide to the Czech Psyche along with 10 accompanying poster-sized reproductions of the paintings. Put them up, peruse these pages and watch internal landscapes open up before you.

 

 

 


Your own personal drawing: 

These are my most popular sellers. You tell me about what's going on in your life, and I make a drawing. Check out the website for more details. There's a limited number of these available at the amazingly discounted rate of $75, so get yours now. It's a fabulous deal and I would love for you to have one. These are regularly valued at $119. 



 

Me, looking very thoughtful and serious in my studio. I promise, I'm really very approachable and lovely to talk to! Photo credit: Daniela Dostálková

Conversations with the artist:

I’m fully committed to helping you to give birth to your own big, miraculous, creative visions. At the $50 or $150 reward level you’ll receive an hour-long conversation with the artist where I’ll answer any and all of your questions about what a project like this entails and figure out how we can get you one step closer to creating the very thing that we both know you’re here to create.

 



 

The Delivery Room:  Lamaze for the Creative Entrepreneur

At the $100 level you’ll receive a downloadable pdf version of my recently released e-course The Delivery Room:  Lamaze for the Creative Entrepreneur. Regularly valued at $147 this course will give you the messy, gritty, behind-the-scenes look, lessons learned and practical tips to show you exactly how I got this far and how you too can give birth to the big, creative vision that’s been gestating inside you. You know it has been! Let’s get you started.    

 

 

In Conversation with Tomáš, mixed media on board, 122cm x 70cm, 2010.

Your own painting!

Donate $1500 and I’ll spend hours asking you about who you are and then make a map (a painting) of your internal terrain. Donate $5000 and I’ll fly to wherever you are and do it right on your very own wall. 

 

 

Why this campaign is so damn worth funding:

  • Because holy shit this book is going to be so beautiful! The designer is incredible, the photos are gorgeous, the words of the interviewees will open up new landscapes and the paintings will pull you into magical non-linear terrain where you can pause and let the complexity of it all coexist and be perfect exactly as it is. 

  • Because this is not just about the Czech people, and its not just about a country in the middle of Europe, this is about connecting to what matters most and to what keeps us all connected.
  • Because this is also about Czech people and for those of us who’ve been here for any length of time we know that we can use all the help we can get!
  • Because nine amazing Czechs have opened themselves up to us, fully, and lovingly and are ready to walk us through the landscape of their psyches.

  • Because these questions, these ancient, profound and connecting questions about who we are and how we came to be, matter. 

  • And because these images, these paintings are the stuff that sparks magical and meaningful conversations. You'll be amazed. You'll want them around you.
     

And of course, if you can’t contribute financially, how about forwarding this on to your friends, or even just donating one dollar. Just one dollar. That’s less than the cost of a cup of coffee.

By forwarding it on, and getting this campaign more indiegogo hits, you’ll increase the chances of this campaign going to a whole other level and being featured on the indiegogo home page.

Beneath the video at the top you'll see various ways to share this campaign. Tweet it, tell your facebook peeps, or use the share tools to spread the word.  And feel my gratitude. Here's are a few suggestions. Feel free to copy and paste directly:  

Tweetable:  "I love it when an artist makes their big dreams a reality. Art + ancestors + creative magic! Check it out. igg.me/at/fieldguidecz"

Facebook:  "Wow. My totally awesome (cousin/artist friend/kindred spirit) landed in Prague, reconnected with long-lost relatives and made an entire series of paintings about it and a book that is going to be beautifully kick-ass.  I'd love it if you could send some love, support or good vibes her way:  igg.me/at/fieldguidecz"

 

 

How can I make a donation? 

Great question. Indiegogo makes it super easy. You can either pay by credit card or via PayPal. Hit the big red "Contribute Now" button in the top right corner and you'll be taken to a page where you can choose your reward.

 

When will I receive my rewards?

This varies and depends on the reward. If you have a look on the sidebar I've given an estimated delivery date for each reward and will do my best to get these to you as soon as humanly possible.  

If I sign up to get a drawing, painting, or triptych as my reward, how will I get in touch with you to discuss details?  

If you sign up for any of these rewards you'll receive an email from me within 24 hours of making your donation. It will include all of the details you'll need to proceed.  

 

I'm totally stoked about the Clothe the Naked Baby course. What can I expect?  

When you sign up for the course you'll receive an email within 24 hours, asking you to confirm your subscription to Clothe the Naked Baby. Once you confirm your subscription you'll automatically receive the next day's transmission and any daily transmissions that you may have missed. As far as content, expect to receive all the bits of wisdom I've gathered and am gathering, put together in digestibly-sized pieces, Tips + Tricks on how to gear up for your own campaign, and special behind-the-scenes video updates of what to expect and how to ride the emotional waves that come with doing something of this magnitude. I've tried to create the exact thing that I could have used to truly prepare me for the wondrous world of crowdfunding. 



When will the Field Guide to the Czech Psyche be printed?  

Our designer is busily working away on it as you donate. We're scheduled to print the books the first week of May, in time to have them ready for the exhibition here in Prague on May 23rd!  

 

I have another question I'd like to ask you before I donate.  

I'd be happy to answer any questions you might have. The best way is to send me an email, or give me a call: 011 420 776 538 465

 

This is a beautiful project that I'd love to do a write-up on. Can we talk?  

Absolutely. Let's talk! Call me, or send along an email and I'll get back to you right away:  011 420 776 538 465

 Me with In Conversation with Ivan, photo by Daniela Dostálková.

 

And for those of you who might not know me, here’s a bit more of my story:  

I’ve been an artist, guide and psycho-cartographer for over 10 years; drawing, painting and thrusting myself into foreign territory in cities throughout Europe and North America to dig deeper into the psychological / spiritual / metaphorical terrain that we all travel. I examine the ubiquitous nature of the creative process, and try to find the archetypal threads that run through each new thing that is birthed into the world. As a guide, my specialty is diving into the messy, dark, powerfully transformative layers of the creative feminine by using images and non-linear ways of thinking, helping others to give voice (and visuals) to the sticking points in their own creative processes.

At the moment I live in Prague, was born on a farm in a small town in Southern Ontario, Canada, studied Illustration in Detroit and went on to study Transformative Arts in Berkeley, California. Beautifully, I’ve received grants and awards from the Ontario Arts Council, the California Institute of Integral Studies, the Detroit Society of Women Painter’s and Sculptors, and the Arts Institute of Prague. I show work regularly in Detroit, have exhibited in California, Michigan, Chicago, Ontario and the Czech Republic and have lectured on art, transformation, community collaboration and the role of the audience in contemporary art. Recently, I was featured on the Art 21 blog.

You can also find me on my website:  www.jessicaserran.com
Or hang with me on twitter, or say hi on facebook. 

From my studio: The tools of my trade. Photo credit:  Daniel Olmos.

story:
Short Summary

During my Master's program at Westminster, among many things, I have been studying how youth who are experiencing homelessness can build resiliency and coping skills through art, and how public art projects can strengthen communities and the marginalized populations that live within them.  For my thesis, I will be combining the two ideas and focusing specifically on how youth can be strengthened through the creative process by participating in a public art mural project.  I have developed a passion for these youth, the struggles they face every day, and the lack of public awareness about this issue.  

For my thesis research project, I have been given approval from UDOT to paint murals on the supporting cement pillars of the 600 South off-ramp in Salt Lake City with the clients of the Homeless Youth Resource Center.  The youth are extremely excited about the project, as are the neighboring businesses who use the area as a parking lot.  

By supporting this campaign, you will be providing an opportunity for these youth to engage in a creative process that can empower and inspire them, and can also help them build social capital and become more connected to their community.  You can help raise awareness to the unique challenges facing homeless youth in the hope that more funding will be allocated to increase the limited number of services available to these youth, and ultimately eliminate the problem altogether. 

What We Need & What You Get

I am raising funds to cover this project from start to finish.  I will begin holding creative art sessions with the youth to help build their trust and to encourage them to express themselves through art.  From there, with the help of my talented artist friend Amy McDonald, the youth will develop the designs that will tell their stories in the murals.  Then the real fun begins when we start painting in the spring.  The funds will go to purchase supplies such as paint, brushes, food and water for the youth, art supplies for the preliminary art sessions, and a stipend for our artist.  We are hoping to have in-kind donations of equipment such as scaffolding and ladders, but may also need funds for the rental of these.

For your contribution, your name will appear on a plaque that will be incorporated into the murals that recognizes all who have contributed to providing this unique opportunity to the youth in Salt Lake City.

And not only that!  You can join in the fun and help us paint!  We will be in need of more volunteers to help create these permanent art installations that will continue to express the voices of these youth to the community in which they live.  

The Impact

Youth experiencing homelessness face extremely difficult and unique challenges every day.  The reasons these youth are on the street are varied.  In most cases, these youth are not typical run-aways, but have either been thrown out by members of their family, have aged out of foster care, or are escaping a home life that is so unbearable that the streets appear as a better option   There is very little provided to these youth in the way of services to help them achieve a brighter future.  It often only takes one person who believes in them to help them turn their lives around.
